entry.def: If something is moving counterclockwise, it is moving in the opposite direction to the direction in which the hands of a clock move.

example.ex: Rotate the head clockwise and counterclockwise.
example.tran: 按顺时针方向转动头部，然后再逆时针旋转。

means.word_mean: 1. in the direction opposite to the rotation of the hands of a clock
1. in a direction opposite to the direction in which the hands of a clock move;

auth_sentence.content: Hurricanes in the Northern Hemisphere always spin counterclockwise.
